[OpenMidLeft]
I've heard some monstrous screams[N]
out in the forest...[A][N]
But also some human ones![A][N]
I'm too afraid to go and see[N]
what's happening, but...[A][N]
You're going, aren't you?[A][N]
Please, take this![A] I don't know if[N]
it'll help, but I want to be some use![A][X]
